findhrAPI
  • Welcome to findhrAPI’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to findhrAPI’s documentation!

The findhrAPI is a package developed for the Fairness and Intersectional Non-Discrimination in Human Recommendation (FINDHR) project, funded by the European Union. Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to install the project.
